text: The Livingston Library in New York City is one of relatively few large libraries of Freemasonry materials. ==See also== *National Heritage Museum (Lexington, Massachusetts) *Iowa Masonic Library and Museum ==External links== * Chancellor Robert R Livingston Masonic Library of Grand Lodge - official site Category:Libraries in Manhattan Category:Masonic buildings in New York (state) Category:Freemasonry in the United States
title: Livingston Library
